scripts.deploy:arbitrum: forge script ./scripts/arbitrum/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --fork-url $(grep ARBITRUM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 10000000000000000 --broadcast --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2)

scripts.coverage:report: forge coverage --fork-url $(grep ETH_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 10000000000000000 --fork-block-number 22730425 --force --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage && rm lcov.info
scripts.coverage:report:swap: forge coverage  --match-path ./test/unit/utils/SwapModule.t.sol --fork-url $(grep ETH_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --gas-limit 10000000000000000 --fork-block-number 23437454 --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info  --ignore-errors inconsistent -o report --branch-coverage && rm lcov.info
scripts.scc:report: scc src --sort names --no-cocomo --exclude-dir interfaces --by-file --format wide > scc-report.txt
